title: KDE Gear 23.08.1 Improves Dolphin, Gwenview, Other KDE Apps
description:
KDE Gear 23.08.1 fixes various issues in several KDE apps, including for the Dolphin file manager and the Gwenview image viewer.

The post KDE Gear 23.08.1 Improves Dolphin, Gwenview, Other KDE Apps appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Fedora 39: Best New Features and Release Details
description:
Explore the release and feature highlights of Fedora 39, which brings the latest GNOME 45, core module updates, and much more.

The post Fedora 39: Best New Features and Release Details appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Sparky Linux 7.1 Released: Here’s What’s New
description:
Powered by Linux kernel 6.1 LTS and based on Debian 12 Bookworm, Sparky Linux 7.1 comes with updated bundled apps.

The post Sparky Linux 7.1 Released: Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Ubuntu 23.10 Will Bring Back ZFS on Root Installation Option
description:
Canonical appears to have found a way to bring back ZFS support with the next Ubuntu release, Ubuntu 23.10 Mantic Minotaur.

The post Ubuntu 23.10 Will Bring Back ZFS on Root Installation Option appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Slowroll: openSUSE’s New Take on the Rolling Release Model
description:
Slowroll is a hybrid openSUSE distro seeking to meld the stability of a fixed release with the advantages of a rolling release.

The post Slowroll: openSUSE’s New Take on the Rolling Release Model appeared first on Linux Today.
